text: Chongkahoi dungjuiya inmani'n akatuun lam injuimak kha kamupha, inmani rakip maikuungnga kei'n Peter diang kati, “Nang Jihudi inkhat na-eli, Jihudi inkhat omchanna ommakche, zaatlop inkhat angnga naom. Kha e-inchu, angtho thoa zaatlop ngaikha inzootmak pumma Jihudi ngai angnga namin om mator sikme?”
